job_desc: Salary range:GBP 50,000 - 60,000 gross per annum, based on experience. Full time position - 40 hours per week Monday to Friday inclusive.  Bank Account Based Blockchain (BABB) is decentralised banking platform that leveragesblockchain and biometrics to offer anyone in the world access to a UK bank account for peer-to-peer financial services. The platform will enable anyone to open a bank account and crowdsource financial services. BABB is a payment institution authorised by the FCA.  BABB is looking to hire a Marketing Director who will grow the brand as well as develop and lead the implementation of the overall marketing strategy. He/she will directly report to the COO of the company. The Marketing Director oversees all marketing activities of the company ensuring the marketing team effectively implements the companys marketing strategy. Main duties and responsibilities:develops and implements an effective marketing and content strategy;manages all aspects of daily work and recruitment and training of the marketing team;liaises with other senior staff to determine the range of services that the company offers;discusses companys clients requirements, plans and monitors surveys and analyses of customers reactions to products;examines and analyses sales figures, advises on and monitors marketing campaigns and promotional activities;produces and/or assesses reports and recommendations concerning marketing and sales strategies;works closely with the product team to ensure the efforts of both teams are aligned and in line with the overall company strategy;ensures company brand guidelines are adhered to in all marketing activities;represents the company at industry events and conferences.Essential skills, qualifications and experience:Degree in Business Administration and/or Marketing (Bachelor and higher).Extensive experience in marketing and digital space.Experience in working on complex projects with large budgets, ICO marketing and online content creation.Knowledge of emerging technology, social media and marketing trends.Strong organisational, project management, and multi-tasking skills.Experience in team management.Self-motivation and drive for results with commitment to details and quality.Experience in organising and managing events (press conferences, launch events, conferences and large scale public events).Desirable skills:Knowledge of cryptocurrency space, connections in the blockchain and crypto community.Experience in banking.Ability to grow and manage online communities.Entrepreneurial mindset with experience in working with/in startups.Additional language skills.Closing date: 8 June 2018 Read moreSee All

job_desc: ConsenSys is a venture production studio and the leading technology firm in blockchain globally. We deliver products, solutions and platforms built using blockchain technology to transform how business is done in complex network of buyers, suppliers and consumers.  Our teams are busy at work building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, the music industry, security, and infrastructure, and more. To accomplish this we've built out a flat organizational structure which we call the ConsenSys Mesh: a network of individuals & teams working autonomously and towards the same goal. Our mission is to use these decentralized solutions to fundamentally reshape the economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet. If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love for you to join us. About Academy at ConsenSys:  The education team at ConsenSys is growing fast within ConsenSys with the first of its kind Blockchain education programs being developed and delivered globally. We are a team of ex-consultants, bankers, product managers, project managers, educators, entrepreneurs, and teachers. Given the explosive growth of Blockchain technologies worldwide, the projects led by this team are strategic in nature with implications for the global Blockchain ecosystem. The teams partners include global corporations, major governments, world class developers / lawyers / business schools and our initiatives are changing education paradigms fundamentally.  Learn more about us here: https://consensys.net/academy/ About the role:  Were looking to build a global, cross-functional interdisciplinary team of Blockchain tech trainers: experts and leaders to serve as in-person trainers to customers, partners and other members of the ConsenSys organization. Responsibilities:Facilitate training courses and programs that cover Blockchain and Ethereum technology, for both Developers and Executives/non-tech usersAct as an advocate of Blockchain technology while representing ConsenSys as a speaker at key industry events, conferences, guest lectures, etc.Responsible for partnering with Academy content specialists to develop or update training materialsCultivate expertise by staying current with Blockchain TechnologyParticipate with the in-person training team to enhance Academys education processesCollaborate with the sales/business development teams to help determine a customers training needsAssist in managing the overall global training schedule, which may include providing back-up capacity to your training colleagues in other offices or regionsQualificationsMinimum of 18 - 24 months of web development experience. Proficient in JavaScript and/or Python is a plus.Flexibility to travel 30-50% of the timeExceptional presentation skills and public speaking experienceExcellent verbal and written skillsAbility to communicate effectively on both a technical and business level to a diverse group of usershave a personable, professional and approachable demeanorBackground in training and/or education is a plusPassion and enthusiasm for Blockchain and the greater movementPreexisting technical expertise in Ethereum a plusHere are some of the perks of being part of a unique organization like ConsenSys:The forefront of a revolution. At ConsenSys we fundamentally believe that a next generation of technologies presents the opportunity to create a more just and equitable society.A dynamic startup environment. ConsenSys is a thought leader in the blockchain space and we are absorbing a significant portion of the mindshare. This is both exciting and challenging, as we learn to scale our organization while adhering to the principles of decentralization.Continuous learning. Youll be constantly exposed to new languages, frameworks and ideas from your peers and as you work on different projects -- challenging you to stay at the top of your game.Deep technical challenges. This entire ecosystem is about 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler. There is much work to be done before these platforms can scale to the order of millions or billions of users. ConsenSys is building the technology platforms that can get us to those next thresholds of scale. Click here for the latest updates from ConsenSys. Read moreSee All

job_desc: This role can be based in Henley-in-Arden or at another Mercia office. JOB PURPOSE: As a member of the Mercia Investment Management team you will be investing in software companies with a focus on SAAS business application software, artificial intelligence, cyber security, blockchain and other emerging technologies. You will mostly be making Seed EIS and EIS investments but will also get involved in investments with other regional funds managed by Mercia and balance sheet direct investments. You will also support the Senior Investment Directors with preparation of investment documentation and reporting. Depending on experience to date, you will represent Mercia as a Non-exec Director on the boards of some of our investee companies. JOB PROFILE (Key Features): The Investment Manager will be responsible for: Working with the analyst team on the dentification, selection and appraisal of investment opportunities;Building and maintaining relationships with accelerators, incubators, corporate advisors, university tech transfer offices and other potential sources of investment opportunities;Completion of investments including negotiation of terms, preparation of investment documentation, management of the due diligence process and control of the legal agreements;Post-investment monitoring of investments, including exit management;Reporting of investment progress to the senior management team.JOB HOLDER (Qualifications & Experience):5+ years relevant work experience preferred; Either previous investment management experience or exerience in the startup community combined with a strong technical background; Sound commercial acumen and analytical skills; Evidence of academic achievement – we will look at the mix of qualifications but a degree in Computer Science, an MBA, or financial qualifications would be advantageous and will be considered positively;Strong work and team ethics;Good communication and interpersonal skills;Experience of financial analysis;Strong Excel skills are essential, together with a good working knowledge of other Microsoft Office products. job_desc: An opportunity has arisen for a French speaking recruiter to join the leading Ethereum blockchain technology company in the world to recruit the teams who are shaping the future of decentralised technology. This will involve finding elite and game changing talent with a passion for developing solutions that will literally change the world. ConsenSys is the largest blockchain venture production studio focused on building and scaling tools and enterprise software products powered by Ethereum. Our mission is to use these solutions to power the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet.  Our teams are busy building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, the music industry, security and infrastructure, and more. It's not just the tech that is groundbreaking - we're also creating new ways of working and an organisational model that has never been implemented on this scale anywhere in the world before! Weve built out a flat organisational structure which we call the ConsenSys Mesh; a holacratic network of individuals & teams working autonomously and towards the same goal. The MeshOps team is responsible for designing and implementing Meshocracy, our own operational & company structure loosely based on the principles of holacracy.  This means that there are no 'line managers' and everyone is responsible for holding themselves accountable for delivering against the projects they're working on. It's a hugely empowering approach, but only if you're comfortable with high levels of ambiguity and constant change. We have highly ambitious growth plans! We grew from 100 to over 700 people globally in the last 18 months, and we're picking up speed! If you have perfected the art of building talent pipelines for volume requirements and spear fishing for niche areas using advanced and innovative search techniques, this will be an extremely rewarding opportunity.  You will play a vital role in growing the European teams as we embark the next part of our exciting journey - paying particular attention to our teams in France.  If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment, and you are self-directed, determined, and resilient, we would love to hear from you. The Role: ConsenSys is seeking a well rounded superstar recruiter to help create and deliver best in class recruiting processes and candidate experience. You'll be based in London, but your main focus will be on leading recruitment activities for our teams in France, and it is therefore vital that you have a wealth of experience recruiting technical professionals in this market. Fluent French (written and spoken) is a core requirement. In this exciting role you will build and maintain proactive partnerships with key stakeholders in order to understand the different team structures, key initiatives and projects, evaluate talent needs, and contribute ideas, solutions and tools.  As part of the global People & Talent team you will work alongside and have support from the European recruitment team, as well as being a key voice as we develop global recruitment policies and processes. ConsenSys is a company in which if you have ideas for improvements, they will be heard!  Due to the rapidly evolving nature of the blockchain space, you will need to be adaptable and willing to work on a variety of technical and non-technical openings. However, the focus will be - at least initially - finding blockchain and full stack developers, DevOps, Technical Project Managers, etc.  Our UK HQ is next to Old Street roundabout, and it would be beneficial for you to be able to spend at least a couple of days a week there. However, as a remote-first company we provide the necessary tools for you to work from home as required. Some travel is also likely to be required from time to time, including visits to other European/global offices, events and summits. Responsibilities:Partner closely with hiring leads in France, owning all aspects of the recruiting process: defining jobs and specs, building interviewer pools and scorecards, application management, active sourcing, screening, scheduling interviews, tracking and admin activities, negotiating and closingRepresent ConsenSys at industry and networking events and meetupsDevelop a pipeline of active and passive candidates using advanced and innovative sourcing techniques (x-ray/boolean, Custom Search Engines, MeetUps, GitHub, StackOverflow, Attendee Lists, Forums, etc.)Create and send out offer letters and related documentationKeep up to date with appropriate French employement law / compliance topicsBecome quickly immersed into the culture and business needs of ConsenSysOwn special projects as they arise, offering unique opportunities for leadership development and growth, such as campus recruiting, assessment of new recruiting services / technologies, creating and implementing development and rotational programs, cross functional projects, etc.Maintain a high level of industry awareness, understanding the startup, tech, and Ethereum/Blockchain landscape to keep tabs on emerging and transitioning businesses, industry news, competitive analysis, etc.About you:5+ years of full cycle recruiting experience and a track record of hiring elite talent (ideally with at least 1 year of in-house experience)Fluent French language skills (spoken and written)2+ years' of experience successfully recruiting in the French market, ideally for well known tech companiesKnowledge of appropriate French employement law / compliance topicsStart-up or entrepreneurial company experience preferredDemonstrated success implementing innovative ways to attract and retain passive candidatesStrong direct sourcing skills (we'll ask about how you use boolean/x-ray searches, find email addresses & contact details from attendee lists, GitHub profiles, etc.)Self-confident, self-motivated and highly-organised with a strong sense of personal accountability (you'll be left to get on with things, so need to be able to deliver results and report on your own pipelines clearly)Excellent verbal and written communication, interpersonal, presentation, facilitation and negotiation skillsProficiency using ATS systems and sourcing tools (we use Greenhouse, but it's not a showstopper if you haven't)Kind, humble, and thoughtfulAbility to focus on the details, but also understand the bigger pictureInterest in new technology, Blockchain, and/or Ethereum (it really helps if you already have a passion for this space)An awareness or appreciation for wider social and environmental issues and how technology is being used to address them Read moreSee All

However, as a remote-first company we provide the necessary tools for you to work from home as required. Some travel is also likely to be required from time to time, including visits to other European/global offices, events and summits. job_desc: ConsenSys is amassing the tools and people needed to build a decentralized future. ConsenSys is a venture production studio, incubating 30+ projects building on the Ethereum blockchain.  We have ambitious goals. We are ambitious people. We believe in what we do and we believe in the team doing it. Role of Community Management: The Community Management team manages events and communications with business, general public, developer, government and university audiences to create an active and engaged community. The team works closely with ConsenSys Solutions, regional teams, and ConsenSys spokes (incubated projects being built on Ethereum) to further our mission of building and scaling a world where distributed applications and the Ethereum world computer enable a new class of frictionless, global commerce with inclusion for all. conduct educational webinarsIdentify recruitment opportunities within the community and make appropriate introductions to colleagues in People and Talent, Solutions and spokesCreate a set of OKRs for tracking performance and expansion of the community across the regionIdentify opportunities for campaigns to increase the visibility of blockchain, Ethereum, and Solidity programming in the developer community, and liaise with colleagues in Growth, Community, PR and other areas for executionSkills Required:At least 4-6 years of experience in technical community management; past or current experience as a developerMust have excellent understanding of the blockchain competitive landscape, as well as both B2B and B2C potential and existing applications for blockchain technologyMust have excellent listening, verbal and written skills and be able to communicate effectively to a technical audience with varying degrees of understanding of ConsenSys, blockchain and EthereumExperience planning and hosting mid to large size events and meetups to hit strategic goalsExperience managing social media for developersStrong interpersonal skills and ability to work across teams to make things happenWhat Makes Someone Successful in this Role?ConsenSys is a decentralized, holacratic (non-hierarchical) company that is distributed across 28 countries - you need to be extremely self directed and self motivated as there is no one telling you what to doMust be comfortable prioritizing and working with teams to identify needs and timingNeed to be very open and collaborative. job_desc: Solution Architect £70,000 - £90,000 Warwick  I am currently recruiting for a Solution Architect for an exciting opportunity based in Warwick. The Solution Architect will spend 80% of their time developing cost effective solution architecture for business demands related to data and applications, and 20% of their time working closely with the central Enterprise Architecture function on technology roadmaps and standards. They will proactively and strategically support the business to leverage cutting-edge technologies to differentiate the key business capabilities and improve overall customer experience/satisfaction as well as increase brand/products visibility and market penetration.  The Solution Architect will work with business teams to capture, at the very early stage, the non-functional requirements and provide early architecture assessment and recommendations with candidate solutions and rough order of magnitude. You will analyse functional and non-functional requirements, and translate them to reliable and cost effective solution architecture that would encompass all the solution elements: Application layers, Integration, data collection, BI, Infrastructure dependency and assess accordingly technical feasibility. You will develop logical, conceptual and physical architectural models for the targeted solution and communicate architectural decisions, plans, goals and strategies to project teams and senior leadership.  The Solution Architect will lead design reviews to ensure compliance of the proposed detailed design by service providers or internal development teams, to the defined solution architecture and this before any implementation kick-off. It is key that you maintain in-depth knowledge of the organization's technologies and architectures and strategic business plans and imperatives. You will give guidance and direction around suitability, cost-effectiveness, performance, resilience, interoperability, operability, portability, scalability, flexibility and maintainability of new technology solutions for business entities.  The Solution Architect must have started as a developer and done significant hands-on application/BI/Data development work and have high exposure to open source technologies (like apache community and others). With strong experience and knowledge on the following technologies: Java, .NET, Web and Mobile technologies (HTML5, JavaScript frameworks - Bootstrap, Angular, jQuery-, PhonegGap, Xamarin), Cloud and COTS Apps, SaaS, PaaS, ideally Azure, SDLC and apps delivery automation, New cutting-edge technologies (Docker, Node.js, AI, IOT, Blockchain), BI/Data: EDW (Oracle, Azure DW), MDM, analytics (Power BI, Tableau, Qlikview, QlikSense), ETL (informatica) , BIG Data (Hadoop/Hortenworks), Architecture modeling : UML, Archimate, TOGAF.  If you have the required skill set and you are ready for an exciting new challenge please apply online today.  Hays Specialist Recruitment Limited acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment and employment business for the supply of temporary workers. By applying for this job you accept the T&C's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at hays.co.uk Read moreSee All

job_desc: The R3Net Support Developer provides a blend of day-to-day technical support of live running Corda-powered Test and Production operating environments (‘R3Net’) and improvement to the reliability and supportability of those environments through the identification and development of enhancements to tooling, scripting and application components.The role requires a flexible and adept technician capable of working with a variety of technologies and toolsets in Unix/Linux and cloud hosted environments. The role will face off to external users of the services and liaise closely with internal (Service Product Management, Devops, Developer Relations, Software Engineering, Architecture) and external (third party software and service providers) to ensure issues and queries are quickly resolved.The role will report into the Support Engineering Manager in the short term although this may change as the organization grows and develops.R3 is on a rapid growth curve but is still a young company. As R3 builds its global capabilities and customer base it will require 24x7 support for mission critical services. As such the candidate must be capable and willing to perform support services in a delivery capacity in the early stages of the role. The role requires prior experience in operating within both development and support organizations and in an Agile delivery culture.As a member of the support organization, your primary focus is to deliver support and solutions to the R3 customer base and to serve as an internal champion of customer needs. This involves resolving technical customer inquiries via phone and electronic means as well as being able to deliver ongoing enhancement to the operational environments you are supporting. Our support staff are considered members of our engineering team and will work to resolve issues at the tier 3 level when required. As such the candidate should possess the capability of development work to identify problematic areas of an application even at the level of the source code operation.Responsibilities· Implementation of a ticketing system and other process elements· Case resolution - research, resolve and respond to complex customer issues across the product line· Provide ongoing assistance to customers operating nodes on the R3Net· Gain an excellent and in-depth knowledge of the Corda products from both a design and operational perspective· Provide support to customers in how to deploy and operate the software· Daily operations - including team operations, process improvement and information sharing· Perform Level 1-3 support (ticketing to resolution)· Create and improve operational tools for R3Net· Documenting resolutions to assist with possible future problem resolution.· When necessary, escalate calls to the engineering team· Act as a technical resource to peers as needed to help resolve customer problems for your area of expertise.· Work with the broader development team in research and development of solutions to new or unknown issuesQualifications & SkillsTo be a candidate you will need to possess a strong technical capability as proven experience in a mission critical support capacity. A strong candidate will have the· 10 years experience in development and support roles in Unix environments, including Tier 3 support experience· Familiarity with mission critical support tools, processes and service levels· Good general understanding of networking and other aspects of computing· Good understanding of SQL as well as MQ· Java or Kotlin programming experience. Corda is developed as a JVM application and requires familiarity with Java as a baseline· Ability to work in Unix scripting languages and tools in highly automated, high-volume processing environments· Demonstrated ability to solve complex technical problems in a support capacity in a high pressure environmentExperience working independently with minimal supervision and guidance· Preferred: familiarity with financial services infrastructure, processes and systems.· Effectively prioritize workload and manage list of outstanding customer queries.· Strong verbal and written communication skills· Ability to communicate confidently and influence highly skilled Software Engineers and SMEs when justified by demonstrable customer need· Excellent interpersonal skills and customer service ethic· A love of solving customer problems to the demonstrable satisfaction of the customerAbout R3Blockchain technology is revolutionising banking and finance. R3 is a unique Fintech company with more than 70 global financial institutions as members, dedicated to harnessing the power of blockchain for the global finance community. R3 has developed its own ground-breaking blockchain platform called Corda and is moving rapidly into production pilot with a range of financial applications in late 2017.To support these pilot applications R3 is developing a suite of Network Services that safeguard the integrity and performance of the underlying ledgers and deliver shared solutions for common activities such as monitoring, reporting and compliance.We have identified a set of core Network Services to be offered for pilot this year and are designing out the initial solutions and a future development roadmap. It is vital that the Services are robust from the outset due to the immutable aspect of the first ledger records.About CordaR3 is building the Financial Services Industry’s premier Distributed Ledger Technology software platform ‘Corda’. As the financial industry begins to move from PoC to Pilot in the second half of 2017, R3 needs to support emerging DLT applications with a comprehensive production environment supporting a range of Network Services to be delivered by R3 and its partners that enable working ledgers on the software platform.Financial Institutions running Corda applications will operate via one or more Nodes which connect with other Nodes over the open internet or via private network links and protected with TLS. Nodes may be hosted locally, on banks own cloud infrastructure environment or a cloud infrastructure environment to be offered by R3. In addition, R3 will host a number of its own nodes and other infrastructure from which the R3 Network Services will be offered. R3 may also have to offer private network configurations for certain applications. Read moreSee All

job_desc: ConsenSys is a venture production studio focused on building and scaling tools and enterprise software products on the Ethereum platform. Our mission is to use these solutions to power the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet.  Our teams are busy at work building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, security and infrastructure, and more. If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love for you to join us.The RoleConsenSys is seeking a content marketer to oversee content published on the ConsenSys Media platform. That means making sure our stories are accurate, clear, well-written, copy-edited, shareable, and engaging for our various audience groups. The content strategist will play a role defining the strategies to make ConsenSys Media an authoritative source of information and thought leadership for all things blockchain and Ethereum.  Along with other team members, the content strategist will be responsible for helping to develop and put into practice strategies geared toward maximizing the number of pageviews and unique visitors to the ConsenSys Media website, as well as optimizing Google Search rankings. We will know that ConsenSys Media is successful if influencers and leaders in finance and technology use our content as a platform to engage in conversations with each other, and turn to our storytelling and leadership in order to understand whats going on in our space.  You will have experience in developing copy and copy editing content, with a mind toward making stories clickable, readable, and shareable, understanding this can mean different techniques on different platforms. He or she should have a sense of how distribution platforms for content -- such as an email newsletter, various social media platforms, and Google Search -- shape the development of content from the very beginning step: choosing what to write.  Experience with startups, working at a media company, and creating content on technological subjects are a plus. Same with SEO, Google Analytics, and content management systems like Medium for Publishers or WordPress. Knowledge about blockchain or Ethereum is not required, but candidates should be interested in the technologies poised to transform the way we live, and be open to learning deeply about blockchain topics.Responsibilities: Develop a content calendar that helps each publisher at ConsenSys know what is expected and when content is dueSupervise content production cycle on ConsenSys Media platformMake sure content published on ConsenSys Media is timely and accurateFacilitate ideation brainstorming sessions with various members of ConsenSysConduct keyword research using Google Keyword Planner to identify topics and keywords that we should rank for and have search volumeConduct a content audit to look for glaring gaps in content we have published to inform our overall content strategyBuild out the content funnel in Google Analytics to track how our content leads to meaningful outcomes for ConsenSys and the spokesCopy edit blog posts and provide feedback to individuals and spokes on writingParticipate in forming content strategy for ConsenSys, Ethereum, and spokesMonitor media and trending topics in the blockchain and cryptocurrency spaceIdentify weekly list of topics for coverage on ConsenSys MediaInterface with media entities for partnership and syndication opportunitiesReview our production capabilities for creating content and lead initiatives to improve our capabilities over time. This should include creating new types of content (video, infographics, interactive guides, etc)Requirements:Excellent command of English, including copy editing for fluency and grammarFamiliarity with the AP style guide, standard practices for headlines, etc.Writes in a way that is engaging and shareable for different audiencesFamiliarity with Google Search and how rankings workFamiliarity with various social media platforms and why content succeeds therePositive and excited about how blockchain is going to change the world Read moreSee All

job_desc: What’s the role? Elliptic is looking for an ambitious, passionate software professional to drive design and implementation of cutting-edge blockchain intelligence tools. Full stack engineers are an essential part of Elliptic’s product team. The role is truly cross functional, with lots of diverse projects to work on and a great opportunity to display your abilities and build on them. job_desc: Company Summary We are passionate technologists who believe in making a difference in the lives of millions living in emerging markets. We aim to change the landscape of finance and remittance. BitPesa () is a cutting-edge online payment platform that leverages Blockchain settlement to significantly lower the cost and increase the speed of business payments to, from and within sub-Saharan Africa. BitPesa's clients range from African businesses and multinational companies paying suppliers as far as China and Dubai to international remittance companies using our API services for white-label payments to dozens of bank networks and mobile money operators across Nigeria, Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Senegal, and the DRC. Our diverse team of over 50 employees spans across Nairobi, Lagos, Dakar, London and Luxembourg and includes former employees of Barclays, Credit Suisse, Wells Fargo, Moneygram, Deloitte Consulting, and PwC. We have raised nearly $10 million in funding from institutional investors including Greycroft Partners, Draper Associates, Pantera Capital, and Digital Currency Group. Our company values are Teamwork, Excellence, Flexibility/Creativity, Integrity, and Passion. Job Summary If you're someone that loves to solve complicated problems using only the tools you build, then you're already the right fit to join us as at BitPesa. The BitPesa development team is already well-known for their cross-functional development knowledge and hands-on approach to getting things done. We are looking for a UX designer like no other, to join us. Our Engineering headquarters are located in London, (Bethnal Green). Key Responsibilities: * Running user research and user testing to evaluate the current product and user needs. * Collaborating and working very closely with the product management team, QA tester, customer support team, and engineering team. * Collaborating with our other UX designer and coming up with consistent designs, making sure products align with our brand and identity. * Handling the design life of a product from the idea stage to post-release. * Iterating through various design phases to always improve. * Sketching, wireframing, prototyping. Ideally, You Should Have: * 3+ years of experience in UX design. * Experience with design tools such as Sketch, Adobe Illustrator, InVision, testing tools etc. * Experience working with agile methodologies, such as Scrum and Kanban. * You are an advocate for user experience and usability. * Experience running UX workshops. * Understanding of Javascript and CSS. * Experience communicating design ideas through different methods depending on the stage of life of the product, to co-workers and stakeholders. * Ability to transform complex business requirements into simple designs. * Experience making design choices based on data and good principles. * Curiosity for UX trends and new technologies. We operate across several cities - London, Luxembourg, Kiev, Nairobi, and Lagos. If you relish the idea of being part of a community that extends beyond the work we do for our customers, you may find you share our passion for solutions using technology. If you want to help change the world with software, we want to hear from you!"Apply direct to employer at https://portal.mypeoplebiz.com/jobboard/bitpesa.aspx?_mj=9206-UX-Designer#__mpbj"  "Other - see free text" Read moreSee All

job_desc: We are about to embark on a dynamic new phase as we transition from our legacy systems to new technologies and we are looking for bright, talented and enthusiastic Engineers to help us. As part of a newly formed team, you will be able to work in an agile, fast paced environment, using your skills to help create the technology and culture on the road to our next exciting stage as a leading UK provider of utilities.The PlanOur 3-5 year plan touches on almost every aspect of technology within the business. We are embracing cloud, microservices and full automation throughout the stack. We use the right tools for the right job and are constantly exploring technology options as we progress with our transition.About youWe are looking for true technologists with a genuine interest in what they do day to day. If you're an open source contributor, hacker and wiz who loves to write code - great, so are we and we would love to hear from you! We are interested in both specialists and generalists; we strongly believe in lean methodologies, testing, automation, cross discipline and above all in getting things done and out there in front of our customers. If your interests span technologies from frontend to linux containers you will find plenty to do here - if you rather concentrate on architecture or react.js then there's plenty of that too.We're looking for someone to build end-to-end web solutionsinfluence and contribute to technical architectureparticipate in the entire development life cycle, from requirements to deploymentautomate There are many interesting challenges to be solved within our domain, many will require specific tech to be used - the list below is just a summary of what is in play today; we are very much counting on you to bring fresh ideas forward!Some of the tech in our stack react.js (Native) and redux ecosystem, node.js, es6 / es7, babel, webpackGo, GraphQL, kafka,aws + kubernetes, Dockercassandra, postgres, dynamo, mongo, blockchain We believe in lean development and agile methodologiestest and behaviour driven developmentcontinuous delivery, testing, integration and deploymentgetting things done and out there We don't dictate or micromanage, we want our teams to be autonomous, proactive and self organising. Were technology agnostic and always try to choose the right tool for the job.How we interviewOur interview process begins with an introductory call to help you learn more about the role, team and wider transformation and help us learn more about you. Next up is a high level technical interview over Hangout to find out more about your technical abilities. You will also have the chance to meet the team and our technical leaders, have a look around our offices and get a feel for who we are.About usTelecom Plus PLC, trading as Utility Warehouse is a FTSE 250 listed multi-utility supplier and currently the UKs only fully integrated provider of utility services, spanning both the communications and energy markets. job_desc: ConsenSys is a venture production studio focused on building and scaling tools, disruptive startups, and enterprise software products powered by decentralised technology, specifically Ethereum. Our mission is to use these solutions to power the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet.Our teams are busy at work building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, security and infrastructure, and more. If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love for you to join us. Our Enterprise team is responsible for solution development and delivery for corporate clients and has led some of the most innovative production blockchain implementations in the world.The RoleWe are currently seeking Solution Architects / Sales Engineers to join our Enterprise team. In this position you will be the technical representative for ConsenSys' products and services, working closely with our Business Development Managers and Delivery Leads in our Enterprise organizartion.This is a hands-on technologist role -- you are not just doing slideware, you’re crafting enterprise blockchain solutions for large organizations. Experience seeing the entire lifecycle from conception to design to technology evaluation to pilot program to implementation to maintenance and support is crucial.Solutions Architects / Sales Engineers do not act as typical consultants - they function as blockchain technical leads & architects during the sales process in conjunction with a sales lead, at our client locations for short term engagements and do everything from developing initial prototype applications to running training and remaining engaged through delivery.Database, distributed systems, full stack development, security & cryptography, and previous blockchain (especially Ethereum) experience are all huge pluses. We're looking for customer-facing hands-on technologists with a track record of success to join us in locations throughout North America, Europe, and Asia Pacific.Our Solutions Architects / Sales Engineers are responsible for securing the client's technical endorsement through complex sales processes including: requirements gathering, solution architecture, product and competitive positioning, partner enablement, proposal generation and drafting appropriately scoped statements of work. You could be onstage at a conference one day, working on a client proposal the next, and delivering partner training the following week, all while collaborating with our product teams on feature roadmaps, token launches or marketing roadshows.A great candidate for this position will be confident whether espousing the business benefits of blockchain technology to executives or diving into code with developers. This person will have a minimum of 3 - 5 years of experience working with with technologists and executives through enterprise software sales cycles, notably with experience in emerging technology ecosystems. If you worked in a pre-sales technical or consulting role at a leading big data, machine learning, or PaaS company for the past few years, you may well have the type of background we are looking for. A similar background at a leading systems integrator or in solutions delivery is also relevant. You need to be comfortable being held accountable to client-based outcomes and in particular vendor/technology selection.It’s important to us that you have a clear enthusiasm and aptitude for learning about new industries, technologies, and how they fit together. Bonus points if you have previous experience in FinTech and/or have a deep understanding of the blockchain / Ethereum ecosystem.This role does not come neatly packaged or defined. You should expect it to change during your time at ConsenSys, to evolve as our organization evolves. What does that mean for you? We think that means you will have an opportunity to create an exciting role with plenty of growth potential over time.When we interview you, we will be looking for people with high levels of emotional intelligence who are also intellectually curious, always professional, dynamic in conversation, charismatic, and persuasive. You must be able to ask specific yet articulate questions, quickly synthesize insights from patterns in conversation, and reflect back the key points from a conversation in order to get alignment, commitments, and lay out next steps. We will also be evaluating your technical skills, including your familiarity with modern development tools and code.From a tactical standpoint, you are highly effective at leading discovery meetings, designing and presenting bespoke sales proposals, staying current on blockchain technology developments, and building and delivering product / technology demos. You must take a hands on approach to technology, collaborating with our internal development teams and clients alike. Last but not least, we expect the solution architects / sales engineers to complete a successful project handover to the delivery team assigned to the project and maintain the client relationship through the delivery phase.If you are ready to take the leap in joining a fast growing company in a business development capacity, we encourage you to apply today!Ability to travel 30-50+% required. Varies by location and team.Responsibilities:You would be working with customers, partners, and prospects to understand and propose solutions using ConsenSys technologiesLead technical sales process for numerous customers day to day, from introductory meetings (net new sales) through post-sales (customer satisfaction, upselling, and subscription renewals)Map your customer requirements to current and future offeringsEducate your prospects on the business value of blockchain in general, Ethereum and ConsenSys' offeringsDrive progress towards successful sales, in concert with Business Development Managers and Delivery LeadsYou should focus on customer successContinuously learn and update your skills in quickly evolving technologiesQualifications:Ability to switch context quickly throughout the day with numerous contending demandsMinimum 3 years experience and success working in a customer-facing roleHands-on, technical, problem solverDevelopment experience with OO programming and full stack developmentUnix/Linux expertise requiredComfortable partenering with customers and public speakingDemonstrated experience gathering and understanding customer business requirementsExperience with full stack development and modern development toolsKnowledge of distributed systemsExperience with many of the following:SolidityOracle, MySQL or PostgreSQLSQL development and optimizationTroubleshootingConcurrency and synchronizationFallacies of distributed computingCommon IPC/RPC methods and patternsHigh availability and business continuityQueuing patterns and pipeline designBatch operationsMessaging systems and patternsSolid OS / networking fundamentalsVirtual memory managementFile system designOptimizationSystem administration knowledgeNetwork architecture Read moreSee All

job_desc: ConsenSys is a venture production studio focused on building and scaling tools, disruptive startups, and enterprise software products powered by decentralized technology, specifically Ethereum. Our mission is to use these solutions to power the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet.Our teams are busy at work building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, security and infrastructure, and more. If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love for you to join us. Our Enterprise team is responsible for solution development and delivery for corporate clients and has led some of the most innovative production blockchain implementations in the world. The Role The business development manager is a consultative sales role at ConsenSys and will be working directly with the Enterprise team in a revenue-generating role, as well as representing broader ConsenSys products to prospective clients. This person will own all business development outcomes. We are looking for a variety of candidates and have needs for flavors of this role, some more partner-relationship centric and some more direct-client centric. We are specifically looking for business development managers to support our partnership activities (primarily cloud providers and solution integrators), financial services efforts (New York and London) and industrial/corporate sales.Our business development managers lead technical and delivery teams through complex sales processes: requirements gathering, solution architecture, product and competitive positioning, partner enablement, proposal generation and drafting appropriately scoped statements of work. You could be onstage at a conference one day, working on a client proposal the next, and delivering partner training the following week, all while collaborating with our product teams on feature roadmaps, token launches or marketing roadshows.A great candidate for this position will be confident when entering a board room setting and skilled at leading and supporting complex conversations with ease. This person will have a minimum of 3 - 5 years of experience working with with senior level business executives and technologists through enterprise software sales cycles, notably with experience in emerging technology ecosystems. If you worked in a sales, business development or channel management role at a leading big data, machine learning, or PaaS company for the past few years, you may well have the type of background we are looking for. A similar background at a leading systems integrator or in solutions delivery is also relevant. You need to be comfortable being held accountable to client-based outcomes and ultimately revenue performance.It’s important to us that you have a clear enthusiasm and aptitude for learning about new industries, technologies, and how they fit together. Bonus points if you have previous experience in FinTech and/or have a deep understanding of the blockchain / Ethereum ecosystem.This role does not come neatly packaged or defined. You should expect it to change during your time at ConsenSys, to evolve as our organization evolves. What does that mean for you? We think that means you will have an opportunity to create an exciting role with plenty of growth potential over time.When we interview you, we will be looking for people with high levels of emotional intelligence who are also intellectually curious, always professional, dynamic in conversation, charismatic, and persuasive. You must be able to ask specific yet articulate questions, quickly synthesize insights from patterns in conversation, and reflect back the key points from a conversation in order to get alignment, commitments, and lay out next steps.From a tactical standpoint, you are highly effective at leading discovery meetings, taking thorough notes, continuously qualifying opportunities in or out of the pipeline, designing and presenting bespoke sales proposals to key stakeholders, and overcoming challenges and objections to get to commitments. You must take a hands on approach throughout the contract / negotiation phase to ensure all stakeholders sign off on the engagement with agreeable terms. Last but not least, we expect the business development manager to complete a successful project handover to the delivery team assigned to the project and maintain the client relationship through the delivery phase.If you are ready to take the leap in joining a fast growing company in a business development capacity, we encourage you to apply today!Ability to travel 30-50+% required. Varies by location and team. Background Demonstrated performance in sales/business development in enterprise software or solution deliveryExperience and a successful track record selling new business and products in emerging technology marketsExcellent communication and documentation skillsAbility to execute many tasks in parallel across multiple threads involving numerous stakeholders and counterpartiesCommitment to full transparency and collaborative processes where multiple touch and view points go into every leadAbility to qualify leads and counterparties rigorouslyCommitment to structured negotiations and outcomesDeep passion for developing innovative solutions that surpass or disrupt legacy systems with emerging technologies Requirements Excellent written and verbal English and communication skills5-10 years minimum work experience, 3-5 in sales or business developmentFamiliarity with with CRM tools and pipeline managementExperience marketing emerging technologies and a strong interest in blockchain Read moreSee All

job_desc: View All Vacancies  View Previous List  PhD Studentship: Cyber Security  Cyber Security Location: Highfield Campus Closing Date: Friday 31 August 2018 Reference: 980318FP  Project title: Cyber Security Supervisor: TBCCo-supervisor: TBC Project description Applications are invited for a PhD studentship in Cyber Security. The successful candidate will conduct research as part of the Southampton Cyber Security Academy (CSA), a thriving partnership between the University of Southampton and key industrial partners in the Cyber Security area (http://www.soton.ac.uk/csa). The CSA provides a unique environment that facilitates use-inspired and multi-disciplinary research, education, training and outreach. It draws together expertise from across the University, including Computing, Electronics, Law, Management, Mathematics, Sociology and Psychology. Our PhD students have the opportunity to connect their academic research with industrial research and innovation, as well as spend time on real-world, industry-driven research and development activities.  The CSA cuts across the entire cyber security domain, and we are looking for highly motivated and excellent student to conduct high quality, original research in cyber security.  Specific Areas of Interest Include: Trust;Cyber situational awareness;Formal methods;The human component in cyber security;Machine learning;Risk analysis and management;Hardware security assurance;Validation and verification;Data provenance;Autonomy;Probabilistic modelling;Data analysis;Emergent behaviour in the Internet of Things;Characterisation of vulnerabilities in embedded control systems;Software defined networks;Anomaly and intrusion detection;Attack mitigation;Damage assessment;The defence of complex systems;Cryptography for low-power devices;Safety and security co-design;Blockchain;Anonymity and privacy;Domain specific languages for cyber security. Candidate Requirements:  The successful applicant will be expected to work in partnership with industry through the CSA, and this is likely to require UK security clearance.  How to Apply:  Applications should be made through our online system. Details can be found at http://www.ecs.soton.ac.uk/phd/how-to-apply.  References:  For further details, please contact Prof. Vladimiro Sassone (vsassone@soton.ac.uk). Key facts Entry requirements: first or upper second-class degree or equivalent in relevant subject Closing date:applications should be received no later than 31 August 2018 for standard admissions, but later applications may be considered depending on the funds remaining in place.  Duration: four years (full-time)  Funding: full tuition fees, for UK/EU students, and a tax-free stipend of up to £22,000 per year  Assessment: Nine month and 18 month reports, viva voce and thesis examination  Start date: typically October 2018  Applying: www.southampton.ac.uk/postgraduate/pgstudy/howdoiapplypg.html Email details to a friend inShare Read moreSee All

job_desc: ConsenSys is a venture production studio focused on building and scaling tools and enterprise software products on the Ethereum platform. Our mission is to use these solutions to power the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet.  Our teams are busy at work building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, security and infrastructure, and more. If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love you to join us.  The Role  ConsenSys is seeking a growth marketer to oversee paid, performance and optimization efforts throughout the organization. That means recognizing our key performance indicators across different initiatives, analyzing performance for growth opportunities, developing and implementing strategies to drive continuous improvement, and managing any performance budget with a keen eye for ROI. The growth marketer will play a role defining the strategies to scale the Consensys brand name, and acquire and retain quality users cost effectively.  Along with other team members, the growth marketer will be responsible for helping to develop and put into practice strategies geared toward acquiring and retaining new users at scale across Consensys many initiatives. We will know that ConsenSys Growth is successful if we develop playbooks for scaling successfully, sharing insights widely throughout the organization, and generally cultivating a data-driven culture within each initiative.  An ideal candidate has strong experience in data-driven marketing, including programmatic media buying, conversion rate optimization, marketing automation, content marketing and partnerships. He or she should deeply understand the customer decision journey, attribution modeling, budgeting, UX/UI and campaign development. He or she should have an instinct for designing customer-centric programs that drive awareness, conversion and retention; gathering and analyzing data to gauge performance and glean insights; then driving learnings and strategic iterations back into the customer experience to continuously optimize performance.  Experience with startups, working at a media company, and creating content on technological subjects are a plus. Knowledge about blockchain or Ethereum is not required, but candidates should be interested in the technologies poised to transform the way we live, and be open to learning deeply about blockchain topics. job_desc: Elliptic is the world's leading Blockchain intelligence company. We identify illicit activity on public blockchains, providing solutions to leading financial institutions and law enforcement agencies.  We offer a number of products and services that sit on top of a common analytics platform. They cover features like customizable risk scoring algorithms through to fully interactive graph visualisations. The products we make have an impact on thousands of people around the world and enable the legitimate use of cryptocurrencies. We think that's pretty cool! What’s the role? Elliptic is looking for an ambitious, passionate data professional to help expand our cutting-edge blockchain analysis platform.  Data engineering is a core enabler of Elliptic’s offerings. We leverage open source technologies but have also written our own high-performance in-memory data pipelines and analytics engine. With your help we can extend the breadth and depth of our data curation and analytics capabilities. What you’ll do: Overall you will collaborate with engineers and data scientists to develop high performance, flexible data pipelines, visualisations, and analytical systems. Immerse yourself in blockchain - how it works and the various services that use themBuild robust systems to curate harvested data and combine it with public blockchainsEnhance tooling to enable a broad range of analytics and experimentsDesign and maintain data harvesting tools (e.g. dark-web scrapers)Help make architectural decisions (and implement them!)Research, prototype, and recommend new technologies and frameworksHelp other developers - give advice, perform code reviews etc.What is the work like? What are the challenges? Elliptic’s products are at the cutting edge of blockchain analytics. That means we are often tackling difficult problems in uncharted waters. There are more ideas than we have time to work on, the upside being there is always work to do covering lots of different areas. There’s lots to discuss and fascinating work is the norm - working at Elliptic is never boring!  From a data engineering point-of-view the biggest challenges are: Ensuring a single source of truth and a robust ontology for recording facts about participants on the blockchainBalancing high-performance data processing with flexible querying and auditabilityKeeping track of downstream impacts of changes to the data platformStaying on top of the various blockchain developments, forks, etc. that could affect our systemsRequirements2+ years industry experience with Python, Java, or Scala - all three would be ideal!Familiarity with data pipelines and modeling for analytic scenarios (SQL or NoSQL)A fast learner with enthusiasm for learning new technologies and applying them appropriately (avoiding one-size-fits all solutions)Proficiency with LinuxRigor in engineering best-practices (documentation, code reviews, test automation)A passion for solving difficult problemsExcellent attention to detail and understanding requirements beyond the written wordStrong communication skillsBonus points for:Hands-on use of workflow management frameworks (e.g. Airflow, Luigi, Apache NiFi)Familiarity with DevOps tools (e.g. Docker, Ansible, Hashicorp, Jenkins, etc.)Experience with graph databases (e.g. Neo4j)Exposure to real-time analytics and big data technologies (e.g. Spark, GraphX, Hadoop, Akka, ELK, etc.)Strong CS fundamentals, including good working knowledge of algorithms, data structures, and concurrency.Appetite for discussions about economics, money, identity and privacyInterest in cryptocurrenciesKnowledge of and liking for a functional programming approachBenefitsShare optionsPrivate health insuranceWork pension schemeShiny laptop and multiple monitorsBudget for training materials, events, and conferencesQuarterly full day offsitesAnnual company 3 day offsiteCoffee and beer! job_desc: ConsenSys is amassing the tools and people needed to build a decentralized future. We are 650+ blockchain experts, entrepreneurs, computer scientists, designers, engineers, consultants, and business leaders across 6 continents who are motivated by the desire to create a healthier, more balanced world where equity is spread among those creating value, and new efficiencies are achieved across all industries. ConsenSys is a venture production studio, incubating 30+ projects building on the Ethereum blockchain.  We have ambitious goals. We are ambitious people. We believe in what we do and we believe in the team doing it. Role of CRM and Marketing Automation: This team will work closely with ConsenSys Solutions, Marketing, regional teams, and ConsenSys spokes (incubated projects being built on Ethereum), to create messaging, positioning, loyalty campaigns, customer segmentation, and marketing/sales pipelines to further our mission of building and scaling a world where distributed applications and the Ethereum world computer enable a new class of frictionless, global commerce with inclusion for all. Responsibilities:Collaborate with the global team and develop a regional CRM and automation strategy for the ConsenSys brand and for spokes being incubated by ConsenSys in EMEA (Europe, Middle East and Africa).Implement the regional plan in tandem with the functional lead in the US while liaising with local teams in France, Dubai, South Africa and elsewhereCreate Customer Journeys for a B2B, B2G and B2C audiences in EMEACreate standardized email templates and ongoing drip campaigns in conjunction with the Solutions and Marketing teamsDrive leads through the pipeline and qualify them to the Solutions team or spokes in the regionWork together with the Community team to gather participants’ data, and with the Content team to develop relevant email marketing campaignsEnsure the database is segmented effectively for targeted marketing activitiesAssist teams with email marketing and mobile messaging, strategy, and executionWork with local teams to adapt campaigns/emails to local audiences, reflecting values, culture and languageSo. Much. MoreSkills Required:At least 4-5 years of experience in a B2B CRM roleExperience with CRM and Marketing Automation platforms (Marketo, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, HubSpot, Eloqua, etc.)Experience working in an international environmentA mindset of constant campaign improvement through testing, testing, testingMust have excellent listening, verbal and written skills and be able to communicate effectively to a diverse audience with varying degrees of understanding of ConsenSys, blockchain and EthereumDemonstrated experience gathering and understanding customers’ business needsStrong interpersonal skills and ability to work across teams to make things happenWhat Makes Someone Successful in this Role?ConsenSys is a decentralized, holocratic (non-hierarchical) company that is distributed across 28 countries - you need to be extremely self directed and self motivated as there is no one telling you what to doMust be comfortable prioritizing and working with teams to identify needs and timingNeed to be very open and collaborative. You need to be respectful and conscientious of everyone’s opinions and needs while also ensuring that you are being transparent and including relevant stakeholders in your workDemonstrated success in taking a service oriented approach and high level of ownershipIdeally have experience working in a startup environment where you have had to wear many hats at a time (and those hats may change periodically)Experience working cross-functionally in a matrix environment and being the connective tissue between many different teams and collaboratorsAbility to travel 10-20% may be requiredComfortable with a bit of organized chaosWhy this is the Opportunity of a Lifetime? We are in the early phases of adoption of an entirely new wave of technology that will fundamentally disrupt every industry. In 2017 alone, the market cap for cryptoassets went from $15B to over $800B. Ethereum is leading the way with over 1000 DApps built on top of the platform and a community of developers that is tens of times larger than the next community. ConsenSys is a leader in the Ethereum space, working with startups, enterprises, governments, and non-profits on projects across all industries and topics. Read moreSee All

job_desc: Job Title: Senior Manager, Innovation Lab Job Code: 1071756 Skill Band: Projects Location: United Kingdom - London Type: FTC Date Posted: 10 Apr 2018Senior Manager, Innovation LabOne Lime Street,LondonAbout Us Lloyd's is creating an Innovation Lab to maintain Lloyd's profitability and relevance in a changing and challenging environment, and to showcase the spirit of innovation at Lloyd's. The Lab will be located in the Lloyd's Building and will create a fast-track, fast-fail environment where ideas focused on finding solutions for Lloyd's challenges and creating opportunities for profitable growth can be developed to proof of concept stage.  Lloyd's is assigning a provider (company to be confirmed) who will assist in establishing and managing day to day operation of the Lab, as well as source teams/start-ups to populate the Lab and to progress their ideas.  Lloyd's now requires a creative, curious and technically/insurance-oriented Lab Leader to support the Head of Innovation to deliver a successful Lab experience for teams working in the Lab and Lloyd's Market practitioners supporting and contributing to the work of the Lab and to co-ordinate all aspects of the day-to-day running of the Lab. The Role To be the face of the Lloyd's Innovation Lab.  To ensure the successful promotion, delivery and operation of Lloyd's Innovation Lab, including management of all internal and external stakeholders, maintenance of the Lab's governance framework (including managing the relationship with the provider company) and co-ordination and showcasing of Lab teams' activities and progress. What Will You Do?Working with the Lab provider, to co-ordinate the Lab team selection and intake process (including from the Lloyd's Market), consulting with the Innovation Steering Committee.Accountable for the structure of the Lab sessions by cohort and themes/challenges to be addressed in co-ordination with the Innovation Steering Committee.Accountable as the primary interface between the provider, Lab teams, Market practitioners, the Corporation and other third parties as required, including facilitating market involvement in the Lab and coordinating appropriate mentoring and technical support for the Lab teams.To ensure appropriate tools, skills, facilities and support structures are in place to enable the Lab teams to develop proofs of concept.To work with the provider and other key stakeholders (both senior and more junior) to arrange demos of proofs of concept and pilots of concepts emerging from the Lab.To be the on-site Lloyd's representative for the Lab and oversee the management of the day-to-day Lab operations and financials.Accountable for internal and external comms, brand and marketing in coordination with with Lloyd's and the providers comms teams.To lead all activities in respect of the Lab Innovation Showcase area which will feature the latest cutting edge innovation and work of the Lab. Manage the administration of the ideas pipeline and resource allocation.Be accountable for all aspects of Lab management and line manage the Innovation Lab Associate.Be accountable for the co-ordination of all activities (meetings, minutes, actions etc) of the Innovation Steering Committee and ensure effective liaison with the Innovation Investment Committee (including making proposals for investment) and organise events on a large scale to promote the Lab.What You'll NeedOutstanding leadership to effectively manage and track multiple projectsStrong stakeholder management skillsAbility to lead through influence to drive change and achieve results in a large matrixed organisationStrong communication skills, both written and oralCollaborative and engaging working styleProficient at coaching and mentoring multiple areas of specialisationAbility to work on multiple projects at one timeAbility to prioritise, solve complex problems and make decisionsAttention to detailAbility to help members of the Lab staff to troubleshoot wide-ranging problemsProven track record of driving complex estimates that take one or more projects into account and effectively communicating risks and dependencies to stakeholdersProven record of managing to profitabilityAbility to develop clear and concise communicationsOrientation towards strategic and holistic thinkingAbility to multi-task in a fast-paced environmentAbility to think with a start-up/entrepreneurial mind-setAbility to work independently and work with a teamAwareness of key industry data, technology and business trends The Lab Leader should ideally have an insurance background and understand the challenges that the Lloyd's Market currently faces and be interested in the opportunities that innovation can bring.  This job requires a blend of strategic thinking, insurance business acumen, stakeholder management, technical know-how and flexibility as well as sustained curiosity. This role will extend Lloyd's technical horizon through the investigation of innovative and disruptive approaches for important long-term Lloyd's use cases.  The Lab Leader must be Familiar with all forms of digital technologies and passionate about and motivated by emerging technologies including those in AI, Machine Learning, Augmented and Virtual Reality, IOT, BlockchainAble to communicate enthusiastically on Lab projects and express her/his point of view (written and oral) in a clear and compelling manner across diverse groups including senior stakeholders and Lab visitors, as well as supporting the Lloyd's Communication team and Data Lab team as required on Lab related queriesComfortable with managing a number of stakeholders and organising and planning large scale events to promote the LabComfortable in responding to urgent ad hoc queries and requestsProfessional experience with relevant backgroundPrior experience working in multiple modern technical platforms (Cloud-based solutions, Mobile apps, Desktop solutions)Experience in positions requiring managementPrior experience developing and leading projectsAs the successful candidate, you can expect to be rewarded with a competitive salary, an enviable range of benefits.To apply, please visit www.lloyds.comAt Lloyd's we believe that innovation comes from having an inclusive culture of equality and diversity. We use ClearTalents to discover how we might help you feel welcomed, supported and able to do as well as you canwhen applying to work for us, including identifying any reasonable adjustments that we may need to make. Should you feel that you require reasonable adjustments during your application process we request that you pleasefollow this link to create a ClearTalents user profile: http://www.cleartalents.com/apply/lloyds-1mil1522224897 Read moreSee All

job_desc: ConsenSys is a venture production studio and the leading technology firm in blockchain globally. We deliver products, solutions and platforms built using blockchain technology to transform how business is done in complex network of buyers, suppliers and consumers.  Our teams are busy at work building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, the music industry, security, and infrastructure, and more. To accomplish this we've built out a flat organizational structure which we call the ConsenSys Mesh: a network of individuals & teams working autonomously and towards the same goal. Our mission is to use these decentralized solutions to fundamentally reshape the economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet. If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love for you to join us. About OpenLaw at ConsenSys: OpenLaw is a ConsenSys spoke that has built the first smart legal agreements. Were using blockchain technology to reimagine the future of commerce and the $160 billion transactional legal market.  At its core, OpenLaw is a multi-module blockchain-based protocol and markup language to prepare, manage, and execute smart legal agreements. Using the OpenLaw protocol you can seamlessly execute a range of commercial transactions, store digital signatures on a blockchain, and execute smart contracts.  At OpenLaw you must balance passion for the technology while knowing when and how to focus the conversation on our users. At OpenLaw we enjoy an open and inclusive culture, competitive benefits, and the freedom to explore and experiment. We are always iterating and improving our work, the culture, and ourselves.  If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love for you to join us. Please feel free to join our Slack or check out our Medium page before applying. About the role: We use Scala as our main programming language with JavaScript / React for our frontend. Our backend uses LevelDB, and Ethereum to store, search, and verify data. We are product driven and committed to open source. That means our end goal is to the deliver the best and fastest product possible for our users and to do so in a community driven manner.  OpenLaw is looking for experienced full-stack engineers to help build our application. This is a role for engineers who can collaborate with a team to architect and deliver feature upgrades and improvements. Engineering partners in this role have built features such as custom integrations and have implemented significant changes to the application architecture. This person must be comfortable working in diverse development ecosystems and have worked independently in a rapidly scaling start up. Responsibilities:Implement OpenLaw feature upgrades, improvements, and architectural buildsCollaborate with a team to ship major product buildsDeliver on rapid implementation schedules to build web functionality that is fast, scalable, and upholds smart development goals and principlesKeep our users happy by maintaining the software, troubleshooting and fixing bugs.Requirements:5+ years professional development experienceFamiliar with languages and storage solutions like CQRS and Domain Driven Design.Experience in API Design (REST or other) and Akka.Familiar with front-end languages like JavaScript with toolkits like ReactComfortable working on multiple codebases, with the ability to quickly understand new projects and tooling systemsHigh-level understanding of public-private key encryption protocolsExperience with cloud infrastructure (e.g. AWS, Azure)Experience working for a rapidly scaling start-upDetail-orientation throughout the web engineering lifecyclePassion for delivering high-quality web functionality with quick turnaround timesAn open source project on GitHub with 25+ starsCommitment to end users and to making their experience as seamless as possibleDetail-oriented with a commitment to stylish, elegant designHere are some of the perks of being part of a unique organization like ConsenSys:The forefront of a revolution. At ConsenSys we fundamentally believe that a next generation of technologies presents the opportunity to create a more just and equitable society.A dynamic startup environment. ConsenSys is a thought leader in the blockchain space and we are absorbing a significant portion of the mindshare. This is both exciting and challenging, as we learn to scale our organization while adhering to the principles of decentralization.Continuous learning. Youll be constantly exposed to new languages, frameworks and ideas from your peers and as you work on different projects -- challenging you to stay at the top of your game.Deep technical challenges. This entire ecosystem is about 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler. There is much work to be done before these platforms can scale to the order of millions or billions of users. ConsenSys is building the technology platforms that can get us to those next thresholds of scale. Click here for the latest updates from ConsenSys. Read moreSee All

(including any early drafts / design evolution)  Chart / Data visualization or robust data reporting features experience a plus Read moreSee All
